title: NA Ping, wont go down
body:
Hi so since you guys dont anwser tickets, i thought id come to the forums, so i have 114ms constant after patch 7.5 when before that patch had been released i had a steady ping of 27ms EVERY GAME so what is it that makes my ping so bad because every other game i play dota, dota 2, overwatch, smite has low ping whilst this crappy server game runs at high ping that is unbearabl, please come out with ur next patch or fix this issue absolutly ridiculous, makes me want to never play this game again 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
I looked into your tickets and saw that you were in touch with one of our tech agents. Because of their current queue size, they haven't had a chance to respond quite yet. They'll get back to you as soon as they can! 

In the meantime, I can provide a little context as well. When you have consistently high ping only while playing league, there could be some sort of break in the connection between your network and our game servers. Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can patch up that connection.
